items.sentence: What kind of trouble do you think that Tom could cause?
We can go back home if the two of you want to be alone.
If you'd tried a little harder, you would've succeeded.
Tom didn't want to do his chores, but he had no choice.
Tom and I've been through a lot of hard times together.
You and I've been through a lot of hard times together.
I've been late for school many more times than Tom has.
I study French for one hour every day before breakfast.
I wouldn't have been able to do this without your help.
Tom will take care of Mary's children while she's away.
Tom was shot down in the street in front of the church.
Tom will do what he wants, no matter what you tell him.
You don't have to stand out there in the rain. Come in.
My computer is connected to a properly grounded outlet.
Your success depends upon whether you work hard or not.
Please tell me that Tom isn't going to be the new boss.
No one wants to work with someone who always complains.
I'm still waiting for Tom to do what I asked him to do.
I didn't realize that both Tom and Mary had to do that.
I didn't know Tom was supposed to do that this morning.
